message: yeah, i saw that too, in firefox 3.6.6

When I'm at the homepage and I see my list of groups then click the see all members online button.  It shows the 100+ people, but then I believe when more people sign on, all the user images disappear and the modal is shrunken down.  I'm using Chrome 9.0.597.84 Mac OS X 10.6.6  I can provide a snap
